name: Talking Dragon Bob
description:
Talk to Bob the friendly dragon. He will answer with his funny voice and react to what you say or your touch. As he loves to dance he will show you all his different dancing moves. Bob has also a lot of exciting games in his home and he cannot wait to play them with you!
Spend some time with Bob this cute little dragon. He will repeat what you say, show you some cool moves, his passion for music, all his favorite games and much more.

If you like talking animals games like talking dog and talking cat, dragon games, dragon simulator or talking games in general then you will love Talking Dragon Bob!

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ Talking Animal - Talking Dragon
✔ The dragon repeats everything you say with a funny voice
✔ Exciting touch games with many levels like Joe bounce, unblock puzzle, match- 3 etc.
✔ Many different animations
✔ Amazing soundboard with many funny sentences, sounds from animals, guns etc.
✔ Big fun for teenagers and adults of all ages

Talking Dragon Bob is a free application. Download Talking Dragon Bob now and please rate it with 5 stars if you like it.
